td.content: s:21 YO white F describes severe abdominal cramps, severe denial of any fever, blood per rectum or foul smelling stools, severe severe watery diarrhea and Cancer. o:Height 66 in, Weight 102 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 15, GI bleeding scan shows multiple site of bleeding within the small intestine a:Small Bowel Cancer p:administered ELOXATIN - 50 MG/10 ML IV, Leucovorin - 200 mg IV, FLUOROURACIL - 500 mg bolus, performed GI bleeding scan, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:patient presents with moderate diarrhea, moderate flushing, Cancer x 4 weeks. patient also reports chronic moderate intermittent abdominal distension and pain. she is a 22 year old white F. she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life Patient is a moderate drinker o:Height 67 in, Weight 106 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 92, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 18, Skin = facial flushing, Skin = scattered facial telangiectasias a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Oxaliplatin - 85 mg/m2 IV, Leucovorin - 200 mg IV, FLUOROURACIL - 500 mg bolus, and ordered CT Abdomen.
